duties_responsibilities.duty: Focus on delivering well-architected, functionally complete, and rigorously tested research products.
Contribute to core technology including Guidance, Navigation, and Control (GNC), state estimation, target detection, etc.
Work on problems of moderate scope and share ideas and knowledge with the team.
Implement state-of-the-art algorithms on real hardware and demonstrate ability to get all components functioning together.
Contribute to UI/UX design, modeling and simulation, and software development.
Travel within the U.S. may be required (up to 30%).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Computer Science/Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
